title: Cloak Of Mania

fields.name: EFFECTS OF MANIA:
fields.value: uhh help me out here guys

desc:
Post 1520
- When you draw this, pick a player to send this into their identity zone.
- While in your id zone, gain a random effect of insanity at the start of your turn, removing the previous one. If it's your third, sixth, ninth, ect. turn with this in your id zone, gain two effects for this turn.
